Name: -1_process_code_requirements_maintenance
Representative_Docs: ["ai system life cycle processes 6.1 agreement processes 6.1.1 acquisition process 6.1.1.1 purpose the purpose of the acquisition process is to obtain product or service in accordance with the acquirer 's requirements", '6.3.8 quality assurance process 6.3.8.1 purpose the purpose of the quality assurance process is to help ensure the effective application of the organization quality management process to the project', 'the key technical processes for developing ml models are integrated into the life cycle processes as follows system requirements definition process set model requirements ai data engineering process acquire and update data ai data engineering process prepare data implementation process and maintenance process re train and tune model verification process test model before deployment transition process deploy model continuous validation process test model after deployment']

Name: 0_knowledge_acquisition_heuristic_engineering
Representative_Docs: ['for knowledge engineering-based ai systems the following additional activities are included knowledge programming after knowledge has been acquired see 6.4.7 it should be formalized in heuristic model where the computations are either engineered explicitly procedural more according to traditional software programming or implicitly by either specifying rules or probabilities declarative or both', 'note knowledge in the knowledge acquisition process is the knowledge necessary to create the ai models', '6.4.7 knowledge acquisition process 6.4.7.1 purpose the purpose of the knowledge acquisition process is to provide the knowledge necessary to create the ai models']

Name: 14_5259_lineage_quality_provenance

Name: 33_rollback_resolve_versions_deployed
Representative_Docs: ['typical application of configuration management for ai system is rollback to previous version of runtime model when new model turns out to have quality issues', 'the project shall implement the following activities in accordance with applicable organization policies and procedures with respect to the configuration management process an automated process for model rollback can be used to quickly resolve suboptimal model performance', 'additionally the version management of an ai system is no longer sufficient to provide clear status of configuration since the development and logistics versions of the configuration items no longer reflect the guaranteed behaviour associated to the operational configuration']

Name: 34_deep_intent_recognition_operative
Representative_Docs: ['example use cases include outlier detection feature selection and missing value imputation are executed in the pre-processing stage of use case ai solution to predict post-operative visual acuity for laser assisted in situ keratomileusis lasik surgeries data augmentation is executed in the pre-processing stage of use case emotion-sensitive ai customer service generating training samples by data labelling and pre-processing by sentence segmentation and creating word vectors are executed in the training stage of use case deep learning-based user intent recognition', 'example use cases of retraining in the maintenance process include ai solution to quickly identify defects during quality assurance process on wind turbine blades use case ai solution to predict post-operative visual acuity for lasik surgeries use case emotion-sensitive ai customer service use case deep-learning based user intent recognition use case', 'example use cases include training of deep learning is executed in the training stage of the following use cases explainable artificial intelligence for genomic medicine use case ai solution to quickly identify defects during quality assurance process on wind turbine blades use case information extraction from hand-marked industrial inspection sheets use case enhancing traffic management efficiency and infraction detection accuracy with ai technologies use case emotion-sensitive ai customer service use case deep learning-based user intent recognition use case \ufeff\x08 ai solution for traffic signal optimization based on multisource data fusion use case ai solution to quality control of electronic medical record emr in real time use case']
